# Introduction

*This is an auto-generated version of [an interview between Weaviate and Chris Dossman](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iC64q1gFWiY)*.

In this interview, we dive deep into the world of AI startups and the cutting-edge technologies that are shaping the future of work. Our guest, Chris Dossman, is a seasoned entrepreneur and AI expert who has been at the forefront of this industry for several years. He shares his insights on his entrepreneurial journey, the challenges he faced, and the lessons he learned along the way.

Throughout the conversation, we cover a wide range of topics, including:

- Chris's transition from his previous startup, FAQx, to his current venture, [Dicer AI](/ai-startup-journey/transitioning-to-dicer-ai)
- The differences between popular AI frameworks like [LangChain and DSPy](/langchain-vs-dspy), and why Chris prefers the latter
- The innovative ['self-discover' capability](/self-discover-dspy) that Chris implemented in DSPy, and its potential applications
- The role of [prior knowledge and reasoning](/prior-knowledge-ai) in AI systems, and how it compares to learning from scratch
- The impact of AI on the [future of work](/ai-future-work), particularly in automating tedious tasks and enabling more creative and meaningful work
- Insights and lessons from Chris's conversations with other [AI experts](/insights-ai-experts), such as Jason Liu and Sam Altman

Whether you're an AI enthusiast, a startup founder, or simply curious about the future of technology, this interview offers a wealth of knowledge and inspiration. So sit back, relax, and join us on this exciting journey into the world of AI startups and beyond!
